title: Provisional games on a brand new smurf
body: I recently created a smurf in NA called xDSmurfDx and i just hit lvl 30 the other day and have since then been playing some ranked...I am 8 games into my provisionals so far won 7 and lost 1, If i lose the next 2 games does that achieve me low gold or high silver ?

replies.body: I can't really give much insight to what rank you might end up getting, since there are so many things that factor into it. Even if I had all the needed stats and data, it'd still be pretty hard for me to predict where you'd be placed......it's a case of human error vs computation y'know?
